REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1003 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 06-01 0050

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN 25 MLN STG LATE ASSISTANCE
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it provided the money market with late assistance of around 25 mln stg. This takes the Bank's total help today to some 137 mln stg and compares with its latest forecast of a 150 mln stg shortage. REUTER
